verses.verse: וַיִּבְרַ֣ח <S%H1272><s%> vai-yiv-Rach fled דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David; מִנֹּוִות min-noi-vt כמִנָּיֹ֖ות <S%H5121><s%> min-na-Yot Naioth קבָּרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> ba-ra-Mah; in Ramah וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan, Jonathan מֶ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti What have I done מֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> meh- What עֲוֹנִ֤י <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Ni fault וּמֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-meh- What חַטָּאתִי֙ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Ti is my sin לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, thy father כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh that he seeketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. וַיִּשָּׁבַ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-Va' sware ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer moreover and said יָדֹ֨עַ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Do-a' certainly יָדַ֜ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' knoweth אָבִ֗יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, Thy father כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti that I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thine eyes וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he saith אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יֵֽדַע־ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'- know זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> zot let יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan Let not Jonathan פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or יֵֽעָצֵ֑ב <S%H6087><s%> ye-'a-Tzev; this lest he be grieved וְאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> ve-'u-Lam, but truly חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [as] the LORD וְחֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> ve-Chei liveth נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha, and [as] thy soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki is hardly כְפֶ֔שַׂע <S%H6587><s%> che-Fe-sa', [there is] but a step בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> ham-Ma-vet. between me and death

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If פָּקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> pa-Kod at all יִפְקְדֵ֖נִי <S%H6485><s%> yif-ke-De-ni miss אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha; If thy father וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta, me then say נִשְׁאֹל֩ <S%H7592><s%> nish-'Ol earnestly נִשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> nish-'Al asked מִמֶּ֤נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni at דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David לָרוּץ֙ <S%H7323><s%> la-Rutz [leave] of me that he might run בֵּֽית־ beit- לֶ֣חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Le-chem to Bethlehem עִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> i-Ro, his city כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because זֶ֧בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach sacrifice הַיָּמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim for [there is] a yearly שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol the whole הַמִּשְׁפָּחָֽה׃ <S%H4940><s%> ham-mish-pa-Chah. there for all the family

Therefore
